speaker: Rosalie
text: It seems the range really has an impact, doesn't it?

speaker: Player
text: We need more detailed data to analyze this.

speaker: Assistant
text: From my experience, this range might extend across the entire lab.

speaker: Rosalie
text: I agree. Next, we need to check the other equipment.

speaker: Player
text: The entire lab? We might need to reevaluate this.

speaker: Rosalie
text: The control room should have more detailed data to help us locate the issue.

speaker: Assistant
text: The equipment inspection is complete. No other anomalies have been found for now.

speaker: Player
text: The data shows abnormal fluctuations. We might need more advanced tools for analysis.

speaker: Rosalie
text: Contacting headquarters is complete. They will send an expert team over.

speaker: Player
text: Although it might be difficult, I want to try solving this analysis myself.
